page.title: 09A TYPICAL SUNDAY
page.content: At 5.15 a.m. he awakes for he does a{'marking up'}job down at the NSS Newsagents. At 5.30 he arrives at the shop, sorts out the papers and marks up the papers with{Dave {Heathcote. John Ridgett}is absent. The papers arrived late at the shop so Michael is not finished until 6.30.. He leaves at 6.45 to do{'round 4'.} Because John is absent Michel goes back to do his brother's round. When he gets home Michael washes, has breakfast and then goes back to bed. When he later wakes up he goes round to his friend to play tennis. The weather is inclement so they go back to watch T.V.. Later that day they do manage to play tennis. He gets homw at 3.00 and has his dinner and watches T.V.. After visiting his friend again he goes to bed early.
